CuPy : NumPy & SciPy for GPU
============================

`CuPy `_ is a NumPy/SciPy-compatible array library for GPU-accelerated computing with Python.

This is a CuPy wheel (precompiled binary) package for CUDA 12.x.
You need to install `CUDA Toolkit 12.x `_ to use these packages.

If you have another version of CUDA, or want to build from source, refer to the `Installation Guide `_ for instructions.

usage_description: This library is used to accelerate NumPy and SciPy operations on a GPU with Python, allowing developers to leverage high-performance computing. With cupy-cuda12x, developers can migrate CPU-bound computations to run efficiently on NVIDIA GPUs.
